content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron/Copper Smelting Area (around position 0,0)
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Stone furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) 
- Stone furnace at position (4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces have coal fuel but currently no ingredients to smelt

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (around position 9,11)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at position (6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at position (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at position (12.5, 11.5) containing 800 electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (around position -7,24)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at position (-7.0, 24.5) currently out of fuel
- Steam engine at position (-2.5, 24.5)
- Small electric poles connecting power to the factory

### Science Pack Storage/Lab System (around position 0,30)
Consists of:
- Storage chest at position (0.5, 31.5) containing:
  - 865 automation science packs
  - 347 logistic science packs
- Burner inserter at position (0.5, 30.5) feeding labs
- Multiple labs connected to power network

ERROR TIPS

### Research Prerequisites Missing
- Cannot research technologies without required prerequisites:
  - Military science pack needs military-2
  - Logistics-3 needs production science pack
  - Advanced material processing 2 needs chemical science pack
  - Stack inserter needs advanced electronics
  - Advanced electronics needs plastics
  - Oil processing needs fluid handling
  - Fluid handling needs engine technology

### Already Researched Technologies
- Avoid trying to research already completed technologies:
  - Military
  - Logistics-2
  - Advanced material processing
  - Steel processing
  - Fast inserter

### Entity Connection Issues
- When connecting entities with pipes, ensure:
  - Entities are within connection range
  - Proper pipe types are used
  - Connection points are valid

### Resource Management
- Monitor fuel levels in boilers and other machines
- Ensure required ingredients are available before starting production

### API Usage
- Use correct technology names when setting research
- Verify technology exists before attempting to research it
